title: Assignment 1
text:
(b) :
install.packages(“dslabs”)
library(dslabs) data(“polls_us_election_2016”) y <- 0 for (col in names(polls_us_election_2016)) { y <- y + sum(is.na(polls_us_election_2016[[col]])) } print(paste(“Toplam NA sayisi:”, y))
guncelpolls <- polls_us_election_2016
guncelpolls[sapply(guncelpolls, is.numeric)] <- lapply(guncelpolls[sapply(guncelpolls, is.numeric)], function(x) { x[is.na(x)] <- 2003 return(x) })
guncelpolls[sapply(guncelpolls, function(x) is.character(x) || is.factor(x))] <- lapply(guncelpolls[sapply(guncelpolls, function(x) is.character(x) || is.factor(x))], function(x) {
if (is.factor(x)) { x <- as.character(x) } x[is.na(x)] <- “Batuhan” return(x) })
z <- 0 for (col in names(guncelpolls)) { z <- z + sum(is.na(guncelpolls[[col]])) } print(paste(“Toplam NA sayisi:”, z))
print(head(guncelpolls, 10))
